page.title: 16SHOPPING AROUND CONSETT
page.content: We did a survey of the shopping habits of the 64 families of the children in the Junior Department of our school. About two thirds of the families went to Consett for their main shopping About one quarter go to Stanley. About one quarter use the small local shops near their homes.The rest visit Newcastle, Durham,Leadgate,Washington and Annfield Plain.38 out of the 64 families used a supermarket.25 families used a hypermarket or superstore.16 used their small local shops. Every family used their local shops every week.22 families used them once a week.27 families used them often .26 families used them every day.{The survey shows that most {families prefer to use the large shops {which can only be found outside our {block for their main shopping.It also {shows that local shops are important.
